snippet: José Mujica, a former guerrilla who took office in 2010, shuns opulence, donates most of his salary and lives modestly, as he says a leader of a proper democracy should.
abstract: Profile of Uruguay Pres Jose Mujica, former guerrilla who took office in 2010, shuns opulence, donates most of his salary and lives modestly; Mujica's brand of low-key radicalism exemplifies his country's emergence as Latin America's most socially liberal country.
lead_paragraph: José Mujica, a former guerrilla who took office in 2010, shuns opulence, donates most of his salary and lives modestly, as he says a leader of a proper democracy should.

headline.seo: After Years in Solitary, an Austere Life as Uruguay’s President
headline.main: After Years in Solitary, an Austere Life as Uruguay’s President
headline.print_headline: After Years in Solitary, an Austere Life as Uruguay’s President
